text: Blockbuster Pavilion can refer to: *Blockbuster Pavilion Charlotte, later Verizon Wireless Amphitheatre and PNC Music Pavilion, in Charlotte, North Carolina *Blockbuster Pavilion San Bernardino, later Glen Helen Pavilion and Hyundai Pavilion and San Manuel Amphitheater, in Devore, California
title: Blockbuster Pavilion
